verses.verse: וַ֭יַּעַן <S%H6030><s%> answered אֱלִיפַ֥ז <S%H464><s%> Then Eliphaz הַֽתֵּימָנִ֗י <S%H8489><s%> the Temanite וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> and said

הֲנִסָּ֬ה <S%H5254><s%> [If] we assay דָבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> to commune אֵלֶ֣יךָ <S%H413><s%> you תִּלְאֶ֑ה <S%H3811><s%> with thee wilt thou be grieved וַעְצֹ֥ר <S%H6113><s%> withhold בְּ֝מִלִּ֗ין <S%H4405><s%> answer מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> any יוּכָֽל׃ <S%H3201><s%> ? but who can

הִ֭נֵּה <S%H2009><s%> Behold יִסַּ֣רְתָּ <S%H3256><s%> Behold thou hast instructed רַבִּ֑ים <S%H7227><s%> many וְיָדַ֖יִם <S%H3027><s%> hands רָפ֣וֹת <S%H7504><s%> the weak תְּחַזֵּֽק׃ <S%H2388><s%> and thou hast strengthened

כּ֭וֹשֵׁל <S%H3782><s%> him that was falling יְקִימ֣וּן <S%H6965><s%> have upholden מִלֶּ֑יךָ <S%H4405><s%> Thy words וּבִרְכַּ֖יִם <S%H1290><s%> knees כֹּרְע֣וֹת <S%H3766><s%> the feeble תְּאַמֵּֽץ׃ <S%H553><s%> and thou hast strengthened

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> But עַתָּ֨ה ׀ <S%H6258><s%> now תָּב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> But now it is come אֵלֶ֣יךָ <S%H413><s%> to you וַתֵּ֑לֶא <S%H3811><s%> upon thee and thou faintest תִּגַּ֥ע <S%H5060><s%> it toucheth עָ֝דֶ֗יךָ <S%H5704><s%> and you וַתִּבָּהֵֽל׃ <S%H926><s%> thee and thou art troubled

הֲלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יִ֭רְאָתְךָ <S%H3373><s%> afraid כִּסְלָתֶ֑ךָ <S%H3690><s%> thy confidence תִּ֝קְוָתְךָ֗ <S%H8615><s%> thy hope וְתֹ֣ם <S%H8537><s%> and the uprightness דְּרָכֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H1870><s%> of your ways

זְכָר־ <S%H2142><s%> Remember נָ֗א <S%H4994><s%> now מִ֤י <S%H4310><s%> who ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he נָקִ֣י <S%H5355><s%> blameless אָבָ֑ד <S%H6><s%> I pray thee who [ever] perished וְ֝אֵיפֹ֗ה <S%H375><s%> what manner יְשָׁרִ֥ים <S%H3477><s%> were the righteous נִכְחָֽדוּ׃ <S%H3582><s%> cut off

כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> to what רָ֭אִיתִי <S%H7200><s%> Even as I have seen חֹ֣רְשֵׁי <S%H2790><s%> they that plow אָ֑וֶן <S%H205><s%> iniquity וְזֹרְעֵ֖י <S%H2232><s%> and sow עָמָ֣ל <S%H5999><s%> wickedness יִקְצְרֻֽהוּ׃ <S%H7114><s%> reap

מִנִּשְׁמַ֣ת <S%H5397><s%> By the blast אֱל֣וֹהַ <S%H433><s%> of God יֹאבֵ֑דוּ <S%H6><s%> they perish וּמֵר֖וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> and by the breath אַפּ֣וֹ <S%H639><s%> of his nostrils יִכְלֽוּ׃ <S%H3615><s%> are they consumed

שַׁאֲגַ֣ת <S%H7581><s%> The roaring אַ֭רְיֵה <S%H738><s%> of the lion וְק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> and the voice שָׁ֑חַל <S%H7826><s%> of the fierce lion וְשִׁנֵּ֖י <S%H8127><s%> and the teeth כְפִירִ֣ים <S%H3715><s%> of the young lions נִתָּֽעוּ׃ <S%H5421><s%> are broken

לַ֭יִשׁ <S%H3918><s%> The old lion אֹבֵ֣ד <S%H6><s%> perisheth מִבְּלִי־ <S%H1097><s%> for lack טָ֑רֶף <S%H2964><s%> of prey וּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> whelps לָ֝בִ֗יא <S%H3833><s%> and the stout lion's יִתְפָּרָֽדוּ׃ <S%H6504><s%> are scattered abroad

וְ֭אֵלַי <S%H413><s%> about דָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> Now a thing יְגֻנָּ֑ב <S%H1589><s%> was secretly brought וַתִּקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> received אָ֝זְנִ֗י <S%H241><s%> to me and mine ear שֵׁ֣מֶץ <S%H8102><s%> a little מֶֽנְהֽוּ׃ <S%H4480><s%> In

בִּ֭שְׂעִפִּים <S%H5587><s%> In thoughts מֵחֶזְיֹנ֣וֹת <S%H2384><s%> from the visions לָ֑יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> of the night בִּנְפֹ֥ל <S%H5307><s%> falleth תַּ֝רְדֵּמָ֗ה <S%H8639><s%> when deep sleep עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on אֲנָשִֽׁים׃ <S%H376><s%> men
פַּ֣חַד <S%H6343><s%> Fear קְ֭רָאַנִי <S%H7122><s%> came וּרְעָדָ֑ה <S%H7460><s%> tremble וְרֹ֖ב <S%H7230><s%> which made all עַצְמוֹתַ֣י <S%H6106><s%> my bones הִפְחִֽיד׃ <S%H6342><s%> to shake

וְ֭רוּחַ <S%H7307><s%> Then a spirit עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> by פָּנַ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before my face יַחֲלֹ֑ף <S%H2498><s%> passed תְּ֝סַמֵּ֗ר <S%H5568><s%> stood up שַֽׂעֲרַ֥ת <S%H8185><s%> the hair בְּשָׂרִֽי׃ <S%H1320><s%> of my flesh

יַעֲמֹ֤ד ׀ <S%H5975><s%> It stood still וְֽלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אַכִּ֬יר <S%H5234><s%> but I could not discern מַרְאֵ֗הוּ <S%H4758><s%> the form תְּ֭מוּנָה <S%H8544><s%> thereof an image לְנֶ֣גֶד <S%H5048><s%> before עֵינָ֑י <S%H5869><s%> [was] before mine eyes דְּמָמָ֖ה <S%H1827><s%> [there was] silence וָק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> a voice אֶשְׁמָֽע׃ <S%H8085><s%> and I heard

הַֽ֭אֱנוֹשׁ <S%H376><s%> he מֵאֱל֣וֹהַ <S%H433><s%> God יִצְדָּ֑ק <S%H6663><s%> be more just אִ֥ם <S%H518><s%> lo מֵ֝עֹשֵׂ֗הוּ <S%H6213><s%> than his maker יִטְהַר־ <S%H2891><s%> be more pure גָּֽבֶר׃ <S%H1397><s%> every one

הֵ֣ן <S%H2005><s%> even בַּ֭עֲבָדָיו <S%H5650><s%> in his servants לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no יַאֲמִ֑ין <S%H539><s%> Behold he put no trust וּ֝בְמַלְאָכָ֗יו <S%H4397><s%> and his angels יָשִׂ֥ים <S%H7760><s%> he charged תָּהֳלָֽה׃ <S%H8417><s%> with folly

אַ֤ף ׀ <S%H637><s%> How much less שֹׁכְנֵ֬י <S%H7931><s%> [in] them that dwell בָֽתֵּי־ <S%H1004><s%> in houses חֹ֗מֶר <S%H2563><s%> of clay אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> Whose בֶּעָפָ֥ר <S%H6083><s%> [is] in the dust יְסוֹדָ֑ם <S%H3247><s%> whose foundation יְ֝דַכְּא֗וּם <S%H1792><s%> [which] are crushed לִפְנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> before עָֽשׁ׃ <S%H6211><s%> the moth

מִבֹּ֣קֶר <S%H1242><s%> from morning לָעֶ֣רֶב <S%H6153><s%> to evening יֻכַּ֑תּוּ <S%H3807><s%> They are destroyed מִבְּלִ֥י <S%H1097><s%> corruption מֵ֝שִׂ֗ים <S%H7760><s%> without any regarding לָנֶ֥צַח <S%H5331><s%> for ever יֹאבֵֽדוּ׃ <S%H6><s%> they perish

הֲלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> without נִסַּ֣ע <S%H5265><s%> [which is] in them go away יִתְרָ֣ם <S%H3499><s%> Doth not their excellency בָּ֑ם יָ֝מ֗וּתוּ <S%H4191><s%> ? they die וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> without בְחָכְמָֽה׃ <S%H2451><s%> even without wisdom
